tool_description: API que muestra todas las ultimas noticias sobre el dolar blue.
name: Argentina Dolar blue Live
title: Argentina Dolar blue Live

api_list.name: Get all noticias del dolar blue
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://argentina-dolar-blue-live.p.rapidapi.com/blue"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "argentina-dolar-blue-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
